alert.note: Alert for Laurens; Southern Greenville; Southern Spartanburg (South Carolina) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Greenville-Spartanburg (Western North Carolina and Northwest South Carolina)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 15 at 6:14PM EDT by NWS Greenville-Spartanburg
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northwestern Laurens, southeastern Greenville and southwestern Spartanburg Counties through 700 PM EDT... At 614 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 9 miles southeast of Greenville Downtown, or near Simpsonville, moving east at 20 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 40 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Mauldin, Simpsonville, Fountain Inn, Gray Court, Donaldson Center, Five Forks, West Greenville and Fork Shoals. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
